documents2pdfsimulation.name: Convert Documents to PDF
documents2pdfsimulation.description: This simulation takes a sample of office documents of various formats from the CI-BER collection. It uses the same set of documents each time in order to allow performance comparisons. Running as ten users in parallel, it attempts to convert the documents to PDFs.

legacyimage2tiffsimulation.name: Convert Legacy Images to TIFF
legacyimage2tiffsimulation.description: This simulation takes a sample of visual images in older formats. Same set each time allows performance comparison. Running as 1000 users over 5 minutes, it attempts to convert the images to TIFF, a preservation format.
